hero.title: Our Projects
hero.subtitle: Each project is a tool to reach lives in the digital field.

hero.title: Projects ready for your church
hero.subtitle: Each project combines training with real evangelistic action. Your church doesn't just learn—it goes into the field.

logic.title: We train and practice together
logic.preamble: Our projects are not lectures. They are complete experiences where your church is trained and put into action in the same process. We work on a threefold path:
logic.connector1: the church to the digital field,

daod.title: DaoD
daod.subtitle: Digital to Discipleship
daod.description: The church regularly opens a space with games, fellowship, and devotionals in gamer language. A doorway that stays open.

gank.title: Evangelistic Gank
gank.subtitle: Missionary Live Stream
gank.description: Your whole church joins a streamer's live together to share the Gospel in a coordinated and loving way. A surprise strike of love.

ninive.title: Digital Nineveh
ninive.subtitle: Virtual Mission Trip
ninive.description: A digital mission trip lived in one weekend. Young gamers from many churches unite with one mission: enter the game and proclaim Christ.

campeonato.title: Evangelistic Championship
campeonato.subtitle: Purpose-Driven Tournament
campeonato.description: A real tournament where each team receives a mentor who leads weekly devotionals. The championship is the means; discipleship is the goal.

immersiveCta.title: Does your church need something more complete?
immersiveCta.paragraph1: The Missionary Immersion is a full weekend where we awaken, equip, and lead your church to truly evangelize in the digital world. It is not an isolated action, but a complete experience.
immersiveCta.paragraph2: Ideal for missions conferences, youth conferences, and leadership retreats.

finalCta.title: Your church can be a point of light in the digital world.
finalCta.subtitle: Shall we begin?

whatsapp.message:
Hello! 🎯

I came from the **Projects** page, in a contact invitation section, and clicked the **WhatsApp** button.

I’d like help understanding which Missão Digital project best fits our church’s current season.

daod.descricao: An innovative method that uses the digital world as a bridge to real discipleship.

hero.title: DaoD: Digital to Discipleship
hero.subtitle: The church opens its doors. The game attracts. The Gospel transforms.

about.paragraphPrefix: DaoD (Digital to Discipleship) is a project that awakens and equips the local church to reach young people and teenagers nearby and lead them into discipleship. It is not an event. It is a

how.title: How it works in practice
how.subtitle: Four steps to transform games into discipleship

1.title: The church opens a space
1.description: Regularly, the church creates a welcoming and equipped environment for games and fellowship.

2.title: Gamer devotional
2.description: At each gathering, there is a clear and evangelistic devotional in gamer language.

3.title: Invitation to the next step
3.description: Those who become regular or open are invited to Bible study in small groups.

4.title: Ongoing discipleship
4.description: The path goes from pixel to pulpit: Bible reading, prayer, decisions for Christ, baptism.

1.title: Native language
1.description: Young people already live in this world. DaoD does not pull them out of it; it meets them there.

2.title: Real relationship
2.description: This is not megaphone evangelism. It is presence, playing together, and friendship that presents Christ.

3.title: Clear path
3.description: From first game to discipleship, each step is intentional.

finalCta.titlePrefix: Your church can be the place where
finalCta.subtitle: Let's talk about how to implement DaoD in your context.

whatsapp.message:
Hi! 🎮

I came from the **DaoD project page** and clicked the button to **bring DaoD to my church**.

I’d like to talk about the practical first steps to implement it with your guidance.

gank.descricao: Team evangelism in the gaming universe.

hero.title: Evangelistic Gank
hero.subtitle: A coordinated surprise attack. But one of love.

about.paragraphPrefix: In the gaming universe, “gank” is a coordinated surprise group attack. We adapted the concept: a group of Christians joining a live stream or digital platform together to share the Gospel in a

how.title: How it works in practice
how.subtitle: Five steps for a love-driven Gank

1.title: Mobilization
1.description: During a youth service or gathering, the whole church prepares for the action.

2.title: Coordinated entry
2.description: Everyone joins together in the live stream of a streamer who is playing.

3.title: Genuine connection
3.description: The church interacts in the chat, creates connection, and shows real love.

4.title: The Gospel advances
4.description: When the streamer asks who we are, we answer with love and purpose.

5.title: Continuity
5.description: The conversation continues beyond the live stream. The Gospel advances.

1.quote: I was impressed by the number of people who joined the stream with supportive messages. I had never seen such a positive community.
1.author: Participating streamer

2.quote: Gank showed us that we can use technology to do good. It was a transformative experience for our youth ministry.
2.author: Youth pastor

finalCta.titlePrefix: Thousands of live streams are open right now,

whatsapp.message:
Hello! ⚔️

I came from the **Evangelistic Gank page** and clicked the button to **bring Gank to my church**.

I want to understand how to organize this mobilization with both strategy and pastoral care.

ninive.descricao: Strategic mission in the most unlikely corners of the digital world.

hero.title: Digital Nineveh
hero.subtitle: A digital mission trip. One weekend. A whole universe to reach.

about.paragraphPrefix: Inspired by Jonah in Nineveh, it means preaching Christ to a whole universe with unity, courage, and urgency. Digital Nineveh is a
about.paragraphSuffix: , intense and focused, lived in a single weekend.

how.title: How it works in practice
how.subtitle: Five steps for a digital mission trip

1.title: Mobilization
1.description: Several churches unite, and their young gamers prepare for the “journey.”

2.title: The journey
2.description: Together, they “travel to a field” (enter a game). Not for levels, but for souls.

3.title: Continuous mission
3.description: Morning, afternoon, and night, the mission is one: log in, meet people, and proclaim the Gospel.

4.title: Mission base
4.description: Behind the scenes, the church sustains the action with prayer rooms, alignment, testimonies, and mutual care.

5.title: Harvest
5.description: The weekend ends, but connections continue. Discipleship moves forward.

bible.title: Like Jonah in Nineveh
bible.paragraph1: God sent Jonah to preach to Nineveh, a whole city that did not know Him. Jonah went, even reluctantly. And Nineveh repented.
bible.paragraph2: Today, the digital universe is our Nineveh: vast, unknown to many Christians, yet full of people waiting to hear the Truth.

quote.text: Jonah began by going a day's journey into the city, proclaiming: ‘Forty more days and Nineveh will be overthrown.’

finalCta.titlePrefix: Nineveh is waiting. Will your church

whatsapp.message:
Hi there! 🧭

I came from the **Digital Nineveh page** and clicked the button to **bring Nineveh to my church**.

I’d love to talk about preparing our youth for this kind of digital mission trip.

campeonato.descricao: Events that combine healthy competition and the Gospel of Christ.

hero.title: Evangelistic Championship
hero.subtitle: The championship is the means. Discipleship is the end.
hero.cta: Bring the Championship to your church

about.paragraphPrefix: An online gaming championship organized by the church in its own city. But the focus is not the trophy. Each team receives a
about.paragraphSuffix: , not to teach gameplay, but a biblical counselor who loves people. Relationship is the field; the Gospel is the mission.

how.title: How it works in practice
how.subtitle: Five steps for a purpose-driven championship

1.title: Promotion
1.description: The church promotes the tournament and registers teams (squads of 4 players).

2.title: Assigned coach
2.description: Each team receives a Coach, a biblical counselor who loves people.

3.title: Weekly devotionals
3.description: During the week, the Coach leads 4 evangelistic devotionals with simple takeaways.

4.title: Competition
4.description: 3 weeks of online matches (Free Fire or another mobile game).

5.title: Grand Final
5.description: An in-person gamer-fair style event, bringing teams and families together for fellowship and proclaiming Christ.

coach.paragraph1: The Coach is not a gameplay coach. He is a mature believer who loves people.
coach.paragraph2: He leads weekly checkpoints (devotionals), cares for the team, prays for players, and presents Christ naturally. He is discipleship embodied in the tournament universe.

finalCta.titlePrefix: The arena is set. Is your church ready to
finalCta.button: Bring the Championship to your church

whatsapp.message:
Hello! 🏆

I came from the **Evangelistic Championship page** and clicked the button to **bring the championship to my church**.

I’d like to understand the structure to apply this model with discipleship and consistent follow-up.
